abstract: Eugen-Josip "Eugene" Galeković (Croatian pronunciation: [ˈêuːdʒinˈɡalêːkoːʋitɕ]; born 12 June 1981) is an Australian football (soccer) player who plays as a goalkeeper for Adelaide United in the A-League and internationally for Australia.
comment: Eugen-Josip "Eugene" Galeković (Croatian pronunciation: [ˈêuːdʒinˈɡalêːkoːʋitɕ]; born 12 June 1981) is an Australian football (soccer) player who plays as a goalkeeper for Adelaide United in the A-League and internationally for Australia.
